sourceMeaningMnemonic: If the <radical>yakuza</radical> hands you a <radical>spoon</radical>, <kanji>death</kanji> is coming for you. It's the death spoon, a sign that the yakuza is coming to cause your death.
meaningInfo: This spoon isn't for pudding, it's for death!
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Death</kanji> comes in the form of a <reading>shee</reading>p (<ja>し</ja>). The death sheep works for the yakuza, and kills anyone who has their spoon.
readingInfo: Picture the death sheep. He looks like a black shadow, and he has a scar on his face. He's holding a bunch of spoons, from all the other people the yakuza marked for death!
